name: Bridget for Boobs 'em up
detailed_description:
Bridget is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up. She has sexy magnificent body. Do you think she has more chances to make a good career as a prostitute? Do you want to try how good she would be on the street?

This DLC content is available from the game, on the room where you select personages.

Born in Cork, Ireland, Bridget was very active and communicated child with a lot of friends. It was impossible for her to stay at the same place for 5 minutes. One time in 6th grade the school was at recess and while Bridget was running to her friends, she just so happened to kick a HUGE rock (keep in mind, Bridget was wearing flip-flops so it hurt like hell) and without thinking, she shouted at the top of her lungs “mother fucker!” And with her god-awful luck, Bridget's math teacher was sitting at the bench right BESIDE HER. He then took Bridget inside to what she thought was yell at her, but he just couldn’t stop laughing and sent her back outside with a literal candy bar. He is still Bridget's favorite teacher she's ever had.

Bridget grew in a very beautiful, but very active girl. She is feeling boring to work in office or anywhere else, so she decided to try herself as a prostitute.

Help Bridget to take her place on the street!

short_description: Bridget is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with at least 512 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.5 or later
  • Processor: Intel 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS (or similar, Debian-based distro)
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
